column4: I didn't know I had a 64 bit capable processor (Intel Celeron T5500) until last week....  I've been using this laptop for over a year.
But... what are the major problems of 64 bit ubuntu versus 32 bit?
I know that now.  I'm an idiot, murlidhar
64 bits is faster, there is less software for 64 bits and flash is a pain
